Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman hit an imperious 126* from 81 balls
Rain fell to earn Pakistan a win by DLS Method against New Zealand
Pre-Game Insights: Fakhar Zaman said that this group of players shouldn’t be underestimated and just needed to hit their stride
Post-Match Reflections: Fakhar Zaman revealed that it was always in the batters’ minds that DLS could come into play
Fakhar Zaman said that the team had always remained upbeat during their campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: A win in the team’s final game against England, preferably by a large margin to add NRR, could yet send Pakistan into the semi-finals
Others: Fakhar Zaman praised the team's management for staying positive
